description: This file defines an interface IZigWave within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. The interface includes methods for managing ZigBee network device permissions, device information, and binding/unbinding devices.

classes.name: IZigWave
classes.description: An interface for ZigBee network operations, such as permitting devices, fetching device info, and managing binds.

methods.name: Permutable
methods.description: Checks or sets whether a device at a specified address can permute (allowing new devices to join).

methods.name: Device
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for a device with a given id.

methods.name: Devices
methods.description: Returns an iterator over all available devices.

methods.name: Bind
methods.description: Creates a binding between source and destination devices.

methods.name: Unbind
methods.description: Removes a binding between source and destination devices.

ctags.name: IZigWave
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IZigWave : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
